pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game features male nudity and explicit gay sex between two or more males, including explicit text and images. Such content can be disabled within the game. This game also features alcohol use and discussions of sex and sexuality.
